resources.string: To start demonstration say \"Call me later\".
If you have any suggestions or bugs to report, please send us an email.
If you like this app, please give us a good rate on the market. Thanks!
say \'Call me later\' to reject an incoming call

Version 1.0.0

Made by Gulaxoft

Email: gulaxoft@gmail.com

This app was made with using PocketSphinx library.
Click the button with microphone to turn on/off recognizing.

Thanks for downloading. You encourage us to improve this app in future versions.
Have a nice day!
